definition: abbr. for computers, communications, and consumer electronics/China Compulsory Certificate (CCC)

sentences.english: Analysis and discussion are made on the five key factors for "3C" factory quality assurance capability.
sentences.chinese: 分析并探讨了“3C”工厂质量保证能力的五要素。

sentences.english: It is pointed out that in 3C accreditation tests, new standards should be all round implemented.
sentences.chinese: 指出在3C认证试验中，应全面实施新标准。
